overview: Mr. Brian Skiba serves as President of MaxID Corp US and oversees Product Development and Corporate Strategy. He served as Chairman of MaxID Corp for two years prior to taking his current operational position. Mr. Skiba is the founder and managing partner of Treadstone Advisors, a strategy consulting and advisory firm. Prior to his work at Treadstone Advisors, Mr. Skiba was a partner at Arma Partners LLP, a London-based, technology-focused M&A advisory firm where he was involved in over $1 billion of cross-border technology M&A transactions. Mr Skiba was a former ranked equity research analyst and equity strategist on Wall Street. At Deutsche Bank, Mr. Skiba was a Managing Director, the Global Technology Strategist, and a Senior Equity Research Analyst. At Lehman Brothers, Mr. Skiba was a Senior Equity Research analyst in both the United States and Europe. Mr. Skiba was also Senior Equity Research analyst at Cowen & Company. He oversaw over more than 40 capital market transactions and the raising of over $5 billion for software and technology firms during his Wall Street tenure.
